metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35136 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 12.0.3 is vulnerable to authenticated Remote Code Execution. Anattacker who has the access the admin dashboard can manipulate the backupfunction by inserting a payload into the filename for thezipfilename_template parameter to admin/tools/dolibarr_export.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
